title: Did you call Sin Lindsay Graham Trump in 2015 "The Race - Pieting, Bigot Fear of Xenopies "?
subtitle: An online chart quoted accurately from the Republic of South Carolina debases its opponents on CNN.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: (Lendsey Graham) President Donald Trump called "a xenophobic fanatic" in 2015 but in 2018, he claimed that "he never heard him make a single racist statement."
